This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS These tests should not fail. 
PASS Inline violations target the right element. 
PASS Correct targeting inside shadow tree (inline handler). 
PASS Correct targeting inside shadow tree (style). 
PASS Elements created in this document, but pushed into a same-origin frame trigger on that frame's document, not on this frame's document. 
PASS Inline event handlers for disconnected elements target the document. 
PASS Inline event handlers for elements disconnected after triggering target the document. 
PASS Inline event handlers for elements in a DocumentFragment target the document. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
